wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Jonathan Michael Francis Cooper Hall  (born 10 August 1944) is a retired British Army officer, who served as the General Officer Commanding Scotland and the Governor of Edinburgh Castle from 1995 to 1997.

link_mentions.page: List of governors of Edinburgh Castle

response: *Jonathan Hall QC, the current Independent Reviewer of Terrorism Legislation
